description.p: This tool is used to set filesystem attributes specific to Linux-VServer.
The attributes belong to four categories:

optdesc.p: Get attributes of file. See below for valid attributes.
Set attributes of file. See below for valid attributes.
Set context id of file to xid.

section.name: Valid Attributes
section.p: TAG - file is xid tagged (xid tagging)
HIDE - not accessible in xid!=(0|1) (procfs security)
IMMUTABLE - file is immutable (cow link breaking)

section.name: Author
section.p: ix was written by Benedikt Boehm <hollow@gentoo.org>
You will find the newest version of dx in the libvserver package at . There is also a mailing list, you will find information about it at Linux-VServer main site.

section.name: Bugs
section.p: You should report them to the mailing list.
